StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNROTCContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractID int ) AS
SELECT CONTRACT_ID AS ContractID ,NWA_ID as NwaID ,PROGRAM_TYPE AS ProgramType ,NROTC_UNIT_ROWGUID AS NROTCUnitID ,I_AND_I_STATE AS IIState ,I_AND_I_CITY AS IICity ,LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_REASON AS LeaveOfAbsenceReasonID ,LEAVE_OF_ABSENCE_DATE AS LeaveOfAbsenceDate ,USER_LOGIN AS UserLogin ,UPDATE_DATE AS UpdateDate FROM dbo.NROTC_CONTRACT WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE dbo.NROTC_CONTRACT.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
